Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.scheduling.polling

Class Summary
AccountActivationPollingTask A PollingTask which activates or deactivates accounts associated to groups (which result in potentially large number of accounts)
AdInterestsNotificationPollingTask A PollingTask which notifies members with matching AdInterests to published Ads
BulkMessageSendingPollingTask A PollingTask which sends bulk messages
ChargeAccountFeePollingTask A PollingTask which charges account fees
PollingTask Base class for tasks which keeps looking for available data to be processed.
ServiceClientIpResolvingPollingTask A PollingTask that resolves IP addresses for service clients
SmsMailingSendingPollingTask A PollingTask that sends pending SMS mailing messages
